mapper.sql: ID_, NAME_, PASSWORD_, PHONE_, AVATOR_, INTRO_, GENDER_, STATUS_, STATUS_DESC_
mapper.select: select USER_.* from USER_, USERINGROUP_ where USERID_=USER_.ID_ and GROUPID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select TASK_.*, creator.NAME_, creator.AVATOR_ from TASK_, USER_ creator where TASK_.CREATOR_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and creator.ID_=TASK_.CREATOR_
select TASK_.*, creator.NAME_, creator.AVATOR_ from TASK_, USER_ creator where TASK_.GROUPID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and TASK_.CREATOR_=creator.ID_
select NOTIFICATION_.*, USER_.NAME_, USER_.AVATOR_ , 2 liked_ from NOTIFICATION_, USER_ where GROUPID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and CREATOR_=USER_.ID_

select USERINGROUP_.USERID_, USER_.NAME_ USERNAME_, USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_, GROUP_.NAME_ GROUPNAME_ from USERINGROUP_,USER_, GROUP_ where USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_=GROUP_.ID_ and GROUP_.CREATOR_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.USERID_=USER_.ID_ and USERINGROUP_.STAUTS_=2

select GROUP_.NAME_,GROUP_.AVATOR_, MESSAGE_.* from MESSAGE_, GROUP_, USERINGROUP_ where USERID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_=group_.ID_ and MESSAGE_.GROUPID_=GROUP_.ID_ and USERINGROUP_.stauts_=1
select count(1) from TASK_,USERINGROUP_ where USERID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_ = TASK_.GROUPID_
select count(1) from SUPERVISION_,USERINGROUP_ where USERID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_ = SUPERVISION_.GROUPID_
select count(1) from NOTIFICATION_,USERINGROUP_ where USERID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_ = NOTIFICATION_.GROUPID_
select * FROM group_ WHERE ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT group_.ID_, group_.NAME_, group_.creator_, group_.createdate_, group_.avator_, group_.intro_ FROM group_, useringroup_ WHERE useringroup_.userid_ = #{id, jdbcType=DECIMAL} and group_.ID_ = useringroup_.groupid_ and useringroup_.stauts_=1

select unique(GROUP_.ID_), group_.NAME_ gname_, group_.creator_, group_.createdate_, group_.avator_, group_.intro_, u1.NAME_ uname_, 1 status_ from GROUP_, USER_ u1, USERINGROUP_, USER_ u2 where GROUP_.CREATOR_ = u1.ID_ and USERINGROUP_.USERID_=#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and USERINGROUP_.USERID_=u2.ID_ and USERINGROUP_.STAUTS_=1 and USERINGROUP_.GROUPID_=GROUP_.ID_

select unique(GROUP_.ID_), group_.NAME_ gname_, group_.creator_, group_.createdate_, group_.avator_, group_.intro_, u1.NAME_ uname_, 1 status_ from GROUP_, USER_ u1 where GROUP_.CREATOR_ = u1.ID_ and group_.NAME_ like #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select unique(GROUP_.ID_), group_.NAME_ gname_, group_.creator_, group_.createdate_, group_.avator_, group_.intro_, u1.NAME_ uname_, 1 status_ from GROUP_, USER_ u1 where GROUP_.CREATOR_ = u1.ID_

SELECT group_.ID_, group_.NAME_, group_.creator_, group_.createdate_, group_.avator_, group_.intro_ FROM group_, useringroup_ WHERE useringroup_.userid_ = #{id, jdbcType=DECIMAL} and group_.ID_ = useringroup_.groupid_ and useringroup_.stauts_=2
select max(ID_) from user_
select max(ID_) from group_
mapper.insert:
insert into USER_
ID_,
NAME_,
PASSWORD_,
PHONE_,
AVATOR_,
INTRO_,
GENDER_,
STATUS_,
STATUS_DESC_,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{avator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{statusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update USER_
NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD_ = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_ = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AVATOR_ = #{avator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTRO_ = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER_ = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS_ = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS_DESC_ = #{statusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update USER_ set NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD_ = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE_ = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVATOR_ = #{avator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTRO_ = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GENDER_ = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_ = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS_DESC_ = #{statusDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
